title: Escape velocity - rock launched from planet

content.question: A small rock is launched from the surface of a planet with no atmosphere. The initial speed of the rock is <math alttext="2 times v sub escape" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc</mtext></msub></math>, where <math alttext="v sub escape" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc</mtext></msub></math> is the escape speed of the planet. What is the speed of the rock when it is very far from the surface of the planet?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half v sub escape" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mtext>esc</mtext></msub></mstyle></math>
